description: PIMS 4285 BD MSP: Ensuring Sufficiency and Predictability of Revenues for the Georgia's Protected Areas System

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The overall objective of the project is to secure long-term financial sustainability of the Georgia’s Protected Areas system. The project will address such barriers to financial sustainability of Georgia’s Protected Areas System as the insufficiency and unpredictability of revenue sources and, the poor business planning capacities and cost ineffectiveness of site management.
subproject.title: PIMS 4285 BD MSP: Sufficiency
